Name: Raccoon Arrival
About the game: Raccoon Arrival is a third-person exploration game centered around the story of an old hunter and raccoon who trying to find a way to his past. This game is a basic walking simulator with the idea of solving the light puzzle on your journey Along the way, players can uncover artifacts and stories from our raccoon with a red scarf. Key Features: For fans of Firewatch, TheFirstTree, Journey Super emotional music mixed with the huge colorful environment open for exploring The game is full of relaxing puzzles and focused on 1 hour of gameplay
